h: 2 of family killed in Road accident
sub_h: Two out of seven of a family lost their lives, while the five others sustained injuries after their car lost control and fell into a gorge near Ghatgarh in Nainital late on Saturday. The SDRF rushed the injured to the hospital.

h: Three kanwariyas killed in Roorkee Road accident
sub_h: Three kanwariyas on their way to Delhi after fetching holy water from Haridwar, were killed after the motorbike they were travelling on collided with an oil tanker on Roorke-Manglaur (bypass) national highway near Roorkee on Sunday morning.

h: Kanwariya, 22, killed in Road accident
sub_h: A 22-year-old kanwariya lost his life in a collision between a speeding truck and the bike he was riding while en route to Haridwar to collect Gangajal. His friend, who was riding pillion, sustained severe injuries. The deceased has been identified as Badal Singh, a resident of Subhash Colony in Rudrapur.

h: 72 dead in natural disasters, Road accidents since June 15
sub_h: As many as 72 people have been killed in natural disasters and Road accidents since the start of rains this year (June 15) in Uttarakhand, state government data has revealed.

h: Couple, 10-year-old girl killed in Road accident in Haridwar
sub_h: Three persons, including a 10-year-old girl, were killed in a Road accident near Motichor flyover falling under Railwala police station on Wednesday. According to police, they were returning from Rishikesh, when a Uttarakhand roadways bus hit the bike they were riding, from behind.

h: Man, brother killed in Tehri Road accident
sub_h: Two brothers - one of them was to get married on May 1 - were killed and two others critically injured when a car they were travelling in fell into a 100-meter-deep gorge in Tehri Garhwal on Monday, police said. They were going to Rishikesh from Tehri Garhwal to shop for the marriage. Amit Singh, 30 and Vikas Singh, 38 - both residents of Mundala village - were killed, while Girdhari Lal, 60 and his granddaughter Meenakshi, 25 - resident of Nai village - were admitted to AIIMS Rishikesh.

h: 3-year-old girl, dad killed in road mishap in Udham Singh Nagar
sub_h: A man and his three-year-old daughter lost their lives while his wife was seriously injured in a tragic Road accident near Poliganj in Khatima town of Udham Singh Nagar district on Saturday evening.

h: Two dead, 38 injured after bus falls into gorge on Mussoorie-Dehradun road in Uttarakhand
sub_h: A woman and her daughter died and 38 others were wounded on Sunday after a Uttarakhand Roadways bus fell into a deep gorge on Mussoorie-Dehradun road, police said.

h: 2 dead in head-on collision of bikes at Mahuadabra road
sub_h: Two persons were killed and one was injured in a head-on collision of two bikes on Wednesday morning at Mahuadabra road of Jaspur town in Udham Singh Nagar district.

h: Four killed, eight injured in separate Road accidents in Uttarakhand
sub_h: Four persons were killed, including two women, and eight were injured after two four-wheelers fell into a gorge in separate accidents in Chamoli and Pauri Garhwal districts.

h: Uttarakhand: Woman dies in Bageshwar Road accident, son injured
sub_h: A 60-year-old woman was killed and her son injured after their car fell into a 250-meter-deep ditch in Bageshwar's Ghinghartola Sirauli on Tuesday night, police said on Wednesday. Kunti Devi died on the spot, while her 28-year-old son Harish Pandey, who was driving the car, was admitted to the district hospital in critical condition, they said.

h: 4 dead in Uttarakhand's Bageshwar Road accident
sub_h: At least four people were killed and two others, including a two-and-half-year-old girl, injured when a car they were travelling in fell into a 100-meter-deep gorge near Shama Kanauli area of Bageshwar district on Thursday, police said.

h: Uttarakhand: One killed, 3 hurt in Road accident
sub_h: A man was killed and three others were injured after a vehicle they were travelling in fell into a gorge near Fitadi village of Uttarkashi district on Friday evening, officials said on Saturday.

h: Spate of accidents continue in hills: 4 dead in separate mishaps
sub_h: Four people were killed in two separate Road accidents after their vehicles fell into deep gorges in Chamoli and Pithoragarh districts, officials said on Monday.

h: 10 kanwarias killed in separate Road accidents in Uttarakhand over weekend
sub_h: With huge influx of kanwarias into Haridwar in the last few days of the yatra, including dak kanwars (pilgrims who arrive on vehicles instead of on foot), accidents have dramatically increased in the temple town. Over the weekend, as many as 10 kanwarias, from Delhi, Haryana and Uttar Pradesh were killed in separate accidents in Haridwar and Roorkee.

h: Rishabh Pant injured in Road accident near Haridwar, cops say 'lucky to survive'
sub_h: According to police, the star wicketkeeper-batsman of Indian cricket team, was alone in the car when his Mercedes GLE car hit the divider railings on the Delhi-Haridwar highway at around 5.30am. The car then turned a few times before turning into a ball of fire. "Pant sustained injuries on his forehead, a hand and right knee. However, he is conscious and able to talk," a senior police officer said.

h: Uttarakhand: Couple killed in Road accident in Udham Singh Nagar, 6-year-old son injured
sub_h: A couple was killed after the bike they were riding on was hit by a speeding van in the Nanakmatta town of district Udham Singh Nagar on Tuesday evening. The couple's 6-year-old son sustained injuries and is undergoing treatment at a private hospital. The van's driver is at large.

h: Uttarakhand: 2 dead, 3 hurt in two Road accidents
sub_h: At least two persons died while three others sustained injuries in two different Road accidents in Tehri Garhwal and Bageshwar districts on Saturday evening.

h: Uttarakhand police to reward 'Good Samaritans' for helping victims of Road accident
sub_h: Uttarakhand police implemented the Good Samaritans scheme by the Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH) on Saturday to reward people for helping Road accident victims. Giving details, state director general of police (DGP) Ashok Kumar said that the scheme is an effort to curb accidental deaths in the country and encourage people to help the victims.

h: Speeding truck hits motorbike in US Nagar, two killed
Noida resident among 2 dead in Road accident near Kotdwar
sub_h: Two persons, including a resident of Noida, were killed and one injured after the car in which they were travelling skidded off the road and fell into a ditch on the Kotdwar-Pokhara-Bajirao Road in Bironkhal block of Pauri Garhwal district on Tuesday.

h: Two SSB jawans die in Road accident in Pithoragarh
sub_h: Two jawans of the 11th battalion of the Sashastra Seema Bal died late on Sunday after their car fell into a 200-metre-deep gorge from the Thal-Didihat road in Pithoragarh.

h: Haridwar: Kanwaria from UP died in Road accident
sub_h: A 23-year-old kanwaria, identified as Prakash Singh, died in a Road accident in Haridwar on Monday. The victim, a resident of Bala Nagal in Amroha (Uttar Pradesh), was returning from Haridwar on a bike with his friend Ranveer Singh after completing the kanwar yatra when a car hit them from behind. Prakash died on the spot, said police. Meanwhile, Ranveer, who was riding pillion, sustained injuries and is undergoing treatment. Police have impounded the car that was involved in the and are looking for its driver, who is absconding.

h: State police to reward ‘Good Samaritans’ for helping victims of Road accident
sub_h: Uttarakhand police implemented the Good Samaritans scheme by the Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH) on Saturday to reward people for helping Road accident victims.

h: 10 kanwarias killed in Uttarakhand Road accidents over weekend
sub_h: With huge influx of kanwarias into Haridwar in the last few days of the yatra, including dak kanwars (pilgrims who arrive on vehicles instead of on foot), accidents have dramatically increased in the temple town. Over the weekend, as many as 10 kanwarias, from Delhi, Haryana and Uttar Pradesh were killed in separate accidents in Haridwar and Roorkee.

h: One killed, five injured in Uttarkashi Road accident
sub_h: A 43-year-old man died and five others sustained injuries after a pickup vehicle they were traveling in met an accident in the Barkot region of Uttarkashi district late on Wednesday evening.

h: Uttarakhand bus accident: Death toll rises to 26; Shivraj Singh Chouhan reaches Dehradun
sub_h: The number of people killed in bus accident in Uttarakashi has increased to 26 (including 25 pilgrims & a bus conductor) after late night rescue operation.

h: Uttarkashi: 2 pilgrims from Maharashtra killed, 13 injured after tourist vehicle falls into gorge
sub_h: wo pilgrims were killed and 13 others got injured after a vehicle they were travelling in fell into a 100-meter deep gorge from Gangotri national highway in Uttarkashi on Sunday night.

h: Three Pauri residents killed in Road accident
sub_h: Three people, all in their early twenties, were killed after the truck they were traveling in fell into a 100-metre-deep gorge from the Pauri-Devprayag highway early on Tuesday.

h: Four dead, one injured in two separate Road accidents
Delhi woman killed in Road accident in Haridwar
App designed to collect information on Road accidents in Uttarakhand
sub_h: Integrated Road accident Database (IRAD), an App designed to collect complete information about Road accidents, has been initiated.

h: Teacher dead, principal hurt in Road accident in Uttarakhand
sub_h: The physical education teacher of the Government Inter College in Bazpur’s Mahuadabra area, Ganpat Singh (35), died on Thursday morning after the car he was traveling in collided with a speeding truck coming from the opposite direction.

h: 3 Delhi tourists killed, 4 hurt in Road accident near Roorkee
Woman dies in Road accident in Doon
‘193 deaths in 313 Road accidents in Kumaon in 5 months, most due to overspeeding’
sub_h: In the wake of several Road accidents in Uttarakhand in the past one month, including the one at Uttarkashi which claimed the lives of 25 pilgrims and a bus conductor, police have released data revealing the number of Road accident cases in six districts of the Kumaon region in the past five

h: Nearly 5,000 people killed in Road accidents in Uttarakhand in last 5 years
sub_h: More than 4,700 people have been killed and over 5,000 injured in around 7,000 Road accidents that occurred in Uttarakhand between January 2017 and April 2022, as per state government data which TOI got access to on Monday.

h: Minor, infant die in Road accident in Haridwar
sub_h: Two persons, including a one-year-old child, died in Haridwar on Thursday and seven others sustained injuries after a truck hit a four-wheeler and both the vehicles overturned.

h: Man dies in Road accident in Ranikhet
Teacher of Govt Inter College dies, principal hurt in Road accident in Bazpur
Auto passenger, leopard die in Road accident
Man, son killed in Road accident in Roorkee
Over 4,500 killed in Road accidents in Uttarakhand in last 5 years, says police
sub_h: Nearly 4,500 people have been killed and over 5,000 injured in 68,000 Road accidents that occurred in Uttarakhand between January 2017 and February 2022, according to data provided by the state police department.

h: 3 migrant workers coming from Ghaziabad killed in Road accident in Almora; 4 injured
Man who lost friend in Road accident joins helmet drive of Doon traffic police
Uttarakhand: 13 killed, 4 injured after bus falls into gorge in Chakrata near Dehradun
sub_h: At least 12 passengers were killed and 4 others injured after a bus they were travelling in plunged into a 300-metre deep gorge in Dehradun's Chakrata on Sunday.

h: Uttarakhand: Man, six-year-old die in Road accident in Almora
sub_h: A 28-year-old man and a six-year-old girl died after the SUV they were travelling in fell into a 200-metre-deep ditch near Punakot bus stand in Salt town of Almora district. Meanwhile, three others, including a three-year-old girl, sustained injuries in the accident.

h: Congress leader’s son killed in Road accident in US Nagar
1 dead, another hurt in Road accident
sub_h: A 25-year-old man, Manohar Singh, died after the car he was driving fell into a deep gorge on the Thal-Munsyari road on Tuesday.

h: Three Delhi residents injured after road caves in Mussoorie, one critical
sub_h: Sushil, a resident of Delhi’s Amar Colony and Anurag and Rameshwar, residents of Jyoti Nagar area in the national capital, were in a car that tumbled down a 10-m deep gorge on the Mussoorie-Tehri bypass road. The trio were returning from a trip to Dhanaulti when it happened.

h: 19 dead, six injured in three separate Road accidents in U'khand hills within 24 hrs
Father, daughter die in Road accident in Uttarakhand
sub_h: A father-daughter duo died in an accident on the Ramnagar-Bhatrojkhan road on Tuesday. Kamal Singh Rawat (55), a resident of Dhameda Bajan village in Almora, lived in Delhi and was travelling to his village with his daughter Kiran (21) and other five members of the family. His daughter was to be married off on April 27.

h: Man dead, son hurt in Kapkot Road accident
Two junior engineers die in Road accident
sub_h: Two junior engineers working with the Uttar Pradesh Power Corporation Limited (UPPCL) were killed in a Road accident on Sunday when their car hit a road divider in Gurukul Narsan near Roorkee. The victims were coming to Roorkee to celebrate Holi with their friends when the accident took place.

h: Statehood agitator dies in Road accident
DIG Bharne injured in Road accident
sub_h: Deputy Inspector General (DIG), law and order, Nilesh Anand Bharne, and his car driver Mohammad Usmaan, suffered minor injuries after their car was hit by a speeding vehicle coming from the opposite direction on Thursday. The incident occurred near Mandi police outpost under Kashipur police limits.

h: 34-year-old killed in Road accident
Delhi resident, 28, dies in Road accident in Almora
sub_h: A 28-year-old man from Delhi died in a Road accident on Badachina-Seraghat motorway in Almora on Thursday. The victim’s motorbike was hit by an unknown truck near Jamrani Dam.

h: Two killed, one hurt in Kashipur Road accident
Four dead in separate Road accidents in Almora
sub_h: Two Road accidents — one near the famous Kasar Devi Temple and the other in Jainti Tehsil — killed four people in Almora district on Monday while injuring almost a dozen others.

h: Father-son die in Road accident in US Nagar
One killed, two hurt in Road accident in Uttarkashi
860 people killed in Road accidents last year, over-speeding claimed 590 lives
sub_h: As many as 860 people have lost their lives in Road accidents in last one year across the state, a data compiled by the Uttarakhand transport department has revealed. The officials attributed over-speeding and rash driving as the main causes of accidents.

h: Upset over Road accident, 27-year-old kills self
sub_h: A 27-year-old man, Rahul Patwal, hanged himself to death in the forest near Lambidhar on Sunday. Before taking the extreme step, the man, a resident of Mussoorie, informed his family members over a phone call.

h: Woman dead, husband hurt in Road accident in Nainital
sub_h: A 46-year-old woman, identified as Dhana Mishra, died and her husband Vallabh Mishra sustained critical injuries in a Road accident in Nainital on Sunday. The woman and her husband, residents of Halduchaur area of Nainital district, were on a motorbike when a car coming from behind hit their vehicle. The couple was going to collect fodder when the accident took place, said the police.

h: Two-year-old dies, six others hurt in Road accident
Dehradun: 30-year-old killed in Road accident
sub_h: A 30-year-old man was killed in an accident after his scooter collided head-on with another two-wheeler in front of a private college in Selaqui area of Dehradun on late Wednesday.

h: 13-year-old boy among 3 killed in 2 Road accidents
Deaths in Road accidents dip by over 17% in Uttarakhand in 2019
sub_h: In some good news pertaining to road safety in the Himalayan state, the numbers of Road accidents and related causalities have seen a drop last year as compared to 2018.

h: Dehradun: Couple on way to Gurudwara killed in Road accident
sub_h: A speeding truck in the Kichha area of Udham Singh Nagar district ran over a bike borne couple on the Sitarganj-Kashipur highway on Sunday. According to police, the accident took place in the morning at around 11 am when the couple was going from Sitarganj to Nanakmatta Gurudwara.

h: 32 killed in dumper-related accidents in Dehradun this year
sub_h: At least 32 people were killed and over two dozen were injured in Dehradun in accidents that involved either speeding dumpers or trucks this year.

h: 31-year-old dies in Road accident
sub_h: A 31-year-old man died after his vehicle was hit by a truck in Clement Town area of the capital, on Thursday. The impact was so great that the vehicle was left completely crushed and caused traffic jam in the area.

h: Three dead in Road accident
‘Take steps to check causalities in Road accidents involving dumpers’
158 underage drivers killed in Road accidents in last 3 yrs in U’khand, traffic directorate to start drive against menace
